CHAT.comment: CHRISTIAN LEGAL SOCIETY CHAPTER OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, HASTINGS COLLEGE OF THE LAW, AKA HASTINGS CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP,Petitioner v. LEO P. MARTINEZ, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL W. McCONNELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL W. McCONNELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
